properties.title: Be Safe Be Well

properties.description: Open from 08-11-22. Our space is ideal to work in, or enjoy some quiet space. We will not be running any programmes during warm welcome hours. However, if you need someone to chat to, our Chaplain will be on site, and you can request time with him.
properties.title: The Big House Ireland
